assertions.assertion: sem_close will return zero after successful completion.
sem_close will deallocate system resources allocated by sem_open for the same semaphore.
sem_close will have no effect on the state of the semaphore if sem_unlink has not been called on this semaphore.
Calling sem_close with an invalid semaphore descriptor may result in a sem_close returning -1 and errno being set to EINVAL.
